propertyDescriptor.name: BCGoogleDriveAccount
propertyDescriptor.description: Id for the Google Drive Account that EHR should save BC reports to.

propertyDescriptor.name: VirologyResultsUploadFolder
propertyDescriptor.description: Folder location where virology results should be uploaded to.

propertyDescriptor.name: AssignsSecureMessageBoardPrivateFolder
propertyDescriptor.description: Folder location where the assigns group internal message board lives.

propertyDescriptor.name: AssignsSecureMessageBoardRestrictedFolder
propertyDescriptor.description: Folder location where the assigns group restricted message board lives.

propertyDescriptor.name: BloodDrawThreshold
propertyDescriptor.description: Threshold in mL of blood draws getting close to empty
